parameter.name: massIY
parameter.description: the mass moment of inertia in Y

parameter.name: massIX
parameter.description: the mass moment of inertia in X

parameter.name: massIZ
parameter.description: the mass moment of inertia in Z

parameter.name: thrustTWDat
parameter.description: Scaling factor for TWDat derived from current thrust00 in CPACS and current thrustTO from VAMPzero

parameter.name: mDotEngine
parameter.description: mass flow rate through the engine

parameter.name: reynoldsNr
parameter.description: reynoldsnumber relative to the engine length

parameter.name: cD0c
parameter.description: Calculates the zero lift drag coefficient component-wise

parameter.name: aAP
parameter.description: speed of sound on airport level

parameter.name: aCR
parameter.description: speed of sound at cruise level

parameter.name: aType
parameter.description: The Airfoil Type 0. for symmetric, 1. for cambered

parameter.name: ctm
parameter.description: chord position of maximum thickness between 0. and 1.

parameter.description: chord position of maximum thickness between 0. and 1.

parameter.name: cMAC
parameter.description: mean aerodynamic chord of the wing

parameter.name: refArea
parameter.description: reference area for the vertical tail

parameter.name: xMAC
parameter.description: x location of the mean aerodynamic chord of the wing

parameter.name: yMAC
parameter.description: wing mean aerodynamic chord's y location

parameter.name: tcAVG
parameter.description: average thickness to chord ratio of the wing

parameter.name: phiLE
parameter.description: leading edge sweep of a wing element

parameter.name: cD0c
parameter.description: zero lift drag componentwise for the wing

parameter.name: posCoG
parameter.description: Calculates the coordinates of the vtp center of gravity location

parameter.name: twCLIMB
parameter.description: Thrust to Weight ratio for ClimbSegments

parameter.name: twTO
parameter.description: Thrust to Weight ratio for takeoff

parameter.name: mTOM
parameter.description: The maximum Takeoff-Weight for an Aircraft

parameter.name: mLM
parameter.description: The maximum Landing-Weight for an Aircraft

parameter.name: posNP
parameter.description: Position of the Neutral Point relative to cMAC

parameter.name: posCoG
parameter.description: Position of the Center of Gravity relative to cMAC

parameter.name: loDCLIMB
parameter.description: Lift over Drag ratio for ClimbSegments

parameter.name: loDCR
parameter.description: Lift over Drag Ratio for the Cruise Condition

parameter.name: desRange
parameter.description: The design range for the aircraft

parameter.name: massIY
parameter.description: The mass moment of inertia in Y

parameter.name: massIX
parameter.description: The mass moment of inertia in X

parameter.name: massIZ
parameter.description: The mass moment of inertia in Z

parameter.name: loverlay
parameter.description: overlay between cabin and tailcone. i.e. the distance from the beginning of the tail cone to the rear pressure bulkhead

parameter.name: lnose
parameter.description: length of the fuselage nose section

parameter.name: reynoldsNr
parameter.description: Reynolds number relative to the fuselage length

parameter.name: cD0c
parameter.description: zero lift drag componentwise for the fuselage

parameter.name: mStructure
parameter.description: fuselage structure mass from the area

parameter.name: refLayout
parameter.description: defines the critical layout for the cabin design is a steering factor for JoeFuMo

parameter.name: nRow
parameter.description: number of seat rows in the cabin

parameter.name: refAbreast
parameter.description: reference number of pax abreast due to number of pax per row and aisles needed for JoeFuMo

parameter.description: mean aerodynamic chord of the wing

parameter.description: x position of the wings tip section
